name: Parkour Theory
desc: A multimodal dataset for few-shot learning consisting of relational, text, video data of parkour techniques. Data pipeline for collection, validation, and processing, and preliminary results will be made available soon.

name: Pystagram
desc: Python module for downloading Instagram videos

name: Record
desc: A minimalistic Python 3 module for locally tracking experiment parameters.

name: Secure Multi-Party Learning
desc: We implement a distributed deep learning framework, which we call SMPL pronounced [sim-puh l] on top of PyTorch and a novel distributed gradient-based optimization, which we call Hypergraph Stochastic Gradient Descent (HGSGD).

name: Research Paper Summaries
desc: Created presentations for Boston University Machine Intelligence Community's research paper discussions. Commits are under my old Github username levelicarus.

name: AI Educational Material
desc: I created the curriculum and content for Boston University Machine Intelligence Community's first semester-long Fundamentals of Deep Learning workshop.
